title: Maximize the Beauty of the Garden

content.content:
From my understanding it's a prefix problem with a very simple modification by just including positive number. So I don't fully understand how can it be a hard question and what the measurement here for difficulty is?

TBF, I don't think it's comparable to many medium questions even. And personally, I think it's not always a good thing to boost my confidence by lowering the bar of hard questions. :)
I feel the same. This should not be a way to boost one\'s confidence. It can generate overconfidence which will suddenly take a hit during OA\'s or interviews of big tech companies.
